alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 5:51AM MST until January 07 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 to 5 inches in valleys and 6 to 10 inches in mountains above 4000 feet. * WHERE...St. Maries, Ione, Osburn, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Fruitland, Inchelium, Kellogg, Sandpoint, Deer Park, Pinehurst, Wallace, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Lookout Pass, Bonners Ferry, Priest River, Boulder Creek Road, Newport, Chesaw Road, Athol, Northport, Metaline Falls, Eastport, Chewelah, Fourth Of July Pass, Fernwood, Springdale-Hunters Road, Wauconda, Kettle Falls, Sherman Pass, Mullan, Orin-Rice Road, Metaline, Clark Fork, Dobson Pass, Colville, Republic, Tiger, and Flowery Trail Road. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions Saturday and Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
